channel.title: [RSSD] Need a Pixel GFX-er for small job
channel.description:
Hey all,
I am currently in need of a pixel GFX-er who would be able to design and create a few images for some buttons for my program, RuneScape Server Developer - http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,52934.0.html
The person whom I choose to do this will recieve the next version of RSSD before anyone else. (Next version is super awesome )
Reply to this saying you are interested, and stating which contact you would prefer out of: - MSN - AIM - xFire
and we will get to work
~ Budda[br][size=1]Posted at: December 20, 2006, 05:20:47 AM[/size][hr]No Pixel GFX-ers here? :(

item.title: [RSSD] Need a Pixel GFX-er for small job
item.dc:creator: @YourDistracted YourDistracted
item.description:
@YourDistracted wrote:

Ill have a go. I use paint for all my image editing. (use photoshop for image creating) And i use paint 2-3 times a day. So i am pretty good at paint and i could do some pixel art like you have there. Nothing really complicated but yeah.

Read full topic

The current pics I have for the buttons are attatched, as you can see, they suck, so I need some new ones. 1 related to ‘Add item’, 1 to ‘Teleport’, 1 to ‘Mod’ and ‘Admin’ and 1 to 'NPC.
